title: Cherokee (1860) New Testament
title_vernacular: Itse Kanohedv Datlohisdv Ugvwiyuhi Igatseli Tsisa Galonedv utseliga
description: Cherokee translation of the New Testament was published in 1860 by the New York Bible Society. Cherokee or Tsalagi is an endangered-to-moribund Iroquoian language and the native language of the Cherokee people.

language.name: Cherokee
language.area: East and northeast Oklahoma and Cherokee Reservation, Great Smokey Mountains, western North Carolina.
